movie_title: Why pay for bottled water? 6 Minute English
introduction: Learn English and practise your listening skills with BBC Learning English as we ask: can you tell t

vocabulary.definition: making you feel cool again after being hot
vocabulary.example: After the hike, I enjoyed a refreshing drink of cold lemonade.

vocabulary.definition: improving the quality of something by adding to it
vocabulary.example: The enriched soil in the garden produced vibrant flowers.

vocabulary.definition: to make something in large amounts in a factory
vocabulary.example: The company manufactures smartphones in their state-of-the-art facility.

vocabulary.definition: controlled or governed according to rules or laws
vocabulary.example: The financial industry is highly regulated to protect investors.

vocabulary.definition: to make someone go away by frightening them
vocabulary.example: The loud noise scared off the birds from the garden.

vocabulary.definition: to produce a good result, often unexpectedly
vocabulary.example: Despite the odds, his hard work came up trumps and he won the competition.
